title: S2 E6: Meat Is Murder, But Murder Is Also Murder with Sage Brocklebank
description:
You’ve all been asking for him, and we finally got him. This week we talk about Season Two Episode Six with Sage Brocklebank. AKA Officer Buzz McNab! In this episode, Gus' uncle makes a visit and helps solve the case of the poisoned food critic. Plus, Tim goes all out with the "muuuuuurderrrrs."
